name: Radisson Blu Hotel London Stansted Airport

reviews.text: Travelled to it by train. Short walk (under cover) to the large clean hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent for Ataxia UK conference

reviews.text: from the moment you enter, you notice the EXCELLENCE.
reviews.title: great airport hotel

reviews.text: The staff are friendly and very helpfull.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: 3 lifts to all floors, rooms are very nice.
reviews.title: Loved our stay here - amazing service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: twin or doble rooms all with bathroom (or accessable "wet room" is available)
reviews.title: Couldn't believe this was an airport hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is right next to Stansted airport so you can walk to the terminal easily in a couple of minutes.
reviews.title: Fantastic, ideal if travelling from Stansted

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice staff, smooth check in and nice room. We had dinner there which was lovely. But breakfast is spectacular - so many high quality choices.
reviews.title: Is This the Same Hotel?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed before flying out and decided to stay when returning before driving back home. This is a high quality hotel that makes a journey so much more pleasant.
reviews.title: pure bliss...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have only ever had praise for the Radisson Stansted.... but 15th August shook our faith.
reviews.title: So Good, I Wish I could have stayed longer......
Fabulous especially for an "airport hotel"
reviews.text: Having arrived, tired, at midnight, we just wanted to reach our pre-booked business class room. After queuing, we were directed to a room... with a double bed and a camp bed! Not what we ordered, we returned to check in to be told that 'this was the room allocated. I thought somebody knew something.' Well we certainly didn't! (I'd booked a business room as a treat, thinking it would be special.)

Spent just one night at the Raddison. Very friendly staff, relaxing lobby, breakfast buttet excellant. Room clean and quiet, very well equipped, bed big and comfortable, ironing board, coffee maker (esspresso machine free of charge!), television should have some more channels, An attraction is the wine tower in hte lobby.
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel

likes.disliked: — nothing, except I would like more tv channels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Raddison using the car parking service. We found that the rooms and standards of this hotel to be high and the ease of the parking service to be very good. We will certainly be using this hotel again. Only a minor moan that we found that the signage around the airport could have been a little better as we got lost! Minor detail and certainly didn't out us off.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed her again in November for an ICT forum and standards didn't differ.
reviews.title: much better this time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed at this hotel again on 20 feb, The room was lovely. with a seperate lounge area. spotlessly clean, with bathrobes and slippers,all sorts of quality toilettries, including toothbrushes. a great coffee making machine and a cumfy bed
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: we had breakfast delivered to our room at 4.30am which was freshly cooked and delicious.
reviews.title: OK hotel, needs to address problems with staff
Good but not spectacular
reviews.text: Firstly the got the key wrong, dragged myself to the hotel room with bags to find the key didnt work. Dragged myself all the way back (with bags), stood in a long queue for reception and then allll the way back again. Not a good start. Room was very clean and standard Radisson fare. Room service was excellent, quick and the food was very good. The bar area is spectacular if a bit cheesy with trapeze artists et al.
Best location as you can walk in 5 mins, all covered to the terminal.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Big bustling hotel with modern decor rooms. I could not sleep due to guest in rooms nearby so it ruined my stay.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

likes.disliked: — No mobile phone reception in room.

reviews.text: As my daughter and I had an early flight out of stansted on the Sunday
reviews.title: Relax after London

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 8.15am, home to Northern Ireland, we treated ourselves to a night in
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

likes.liked: — The rooms - clean and nice toiletries. Plus the New Years Party!
likes.disliked: — Smokey smell in hallways - not in the rooms though!

reviews.text: This hotel is one of the best high class hotels I have ever stayed in. The rooms had a great view of the airport, you can actually see the flights landing and taking off. The best part is all this without any noise, thanks to the double shielded windows. Room was well decorated with espresso machine. Loved the place!
reviews.title: Excellent place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one night here and enjoyed an excellent evening meal in the New York Grill Bar. The room was comfortable and in general the facilities were above average. Breakfast looked inviting with lots of choice. We selected the hot breakfast at almost £15....what a disappointment! The bacon, sausage, eggs etc were barely warm and the potatoes and tomatoes were undercooked and hard. The pastries and bread did not seem to be fresh that day. We tried the 'fresh' fruit but it was extremely cold and too hard to bite! The head waiter could only agree with us and apologise. We would use this hotel again but next time would opt for a hotter (and possibly fresher!) breakfast in the actual airport!
reviews.title: nice hotel - shame about the breakfast

likes.liked: — Modern and clean. Very quiet considering proximity of airport. No noise from other rooms.
likes.disliked: — Heating difficult to adjust and slow to respond.

reviews.text: Perfect for getting an early morning flight from Stansted. We've stayed a couple of times and now feel like its the best start to our holidays! Clean,spacious and great value for money.
reviews.title: Great start to holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Radisson for one night because my wife and I had to catch a 9.00am flight and did not want to drive around the M25 at that time of the morning. Also we had an 11.00pm flight return and I did not want to wait for a taxi/bus to take me to my car.
reviews.title: Convenient and worth the stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Asked for a quiet room and this is exactly what we were given; did not hear a sound. The check in was quick and easy. The beakfast spread was very good value for money. The car pick up was easy and we were on our way within 10 minutes of going through customs. Will do the same again if I am flying from Stansted
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

likes.liked: — The location, so convenient for getting to the airport.
likes.disliked: — Nothing, there were no problems whatsoever!

reviews.text: I have stayed at this Radisson countless times and every single one has been a pleasure.
reviews.title: Amazing

likes.liked: — The variety of restaurants and the fitness club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is the best Radisson hotel in Europe by far. Very modern, cosmopolita, trendy, clean and big.
reviews.title: Lovely Comfortable Bed Heated Bathroom Floor..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are very big with a superb, varied decoration depending on the floor it is located.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

likes.liked: — Proximity to Stansted airport, comfort and style!

reviews.text: It has 3 different restaurants to choose serving food all day long and a very sophisticated bar-lounge with a huge wine tower in the middle.
reviews.title: Excellent Standards. Quiet & Stylish Rooms

reviews.text: The staff is friendly and efficient, i have never had any problems.
reviews.title: Stylish Atrium.

reviews.text: This is a great hotel with a high standard of service.
reviews.title: Not what you expect!

reviews.text: I was forced into staying a night here when a flight was cancelled. There is nothing worse than a low standard airport hotel - and the Radisson SAS Hotel at Stansted Airport is not your average Airport Hotel.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay at the Radisson Stansted

likes.liked: — The close proximity to the airport, the quality of service and the great room

reviews.text: The rooms are comfortable, they meet and thoroughly exceed the 'basics' standards expected:
reviews.title: Top Class!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. Cleanliness - room looked like it was brand new. Everything was super clean.
reviews.title: Fantastic comfort, a blessing for travellers
OK Hotel! OK Stay!
reviews.text: 2. Reasonable price - considering I walked in and asked for a room, the price was reasonable.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I always find Radisson SAS hotels to be of a good standard, this is no exception.
reviews.title: Park and Travel convenience

likes.disliked: — did not manage the queue to checkout and allowed people to queue jump

reviews.title: Never Never leave your car
reviews.text: Walking distance from the terminal. You park in the hotel car park, drop our keys off at reception. Your car is taken off site for the duration of your holiday but is returned back to the hotel for when you get back. You simply walk to the hotel, get your keys from concierge and off you go.
Rooms: Comfortable, good quality furnishings. Well soundproofed, no trouble from the corridor or adjoining rooms (often the case with airport hotels I find).
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Food: Cannot comment.
reviews.title: Convenient and Modern

likes.liked: — Ultra-modern, complimentary wireless internet, close to airport
likes.disliked: — Not ideally suitable as a base to explore London

reviews.title: Lovely, just what I needed
reviews.text: Never never leave your car while staying and flying out for a few days unless you have no concern for how it is handled. The Radisson uses an off site parking area and the drivers who shuttle the cars back and forth can only be described as maniacs. On the day I stayed an Audi convention was taking place and I witnessed the drivers handling these cars in the most appalling manner. My own car must have been similarly driven as witness by the state of the contents of the boot on my return. Never in the 66000 miles I have driven the car have I managed to completely trash it the way these drivers did. Think carefully before leaving your car in the hands of the Radission at Stansted Airport.
